scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'update CHANGELOG.md' && pnpm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'update CHANGELOG.md' && pnpm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'update CHANGELOG.md' && pnpm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
